about_the_game:
Did you enjoy Will The Man Get Frog?
Consider supporting the dev!


This DLC doesn't add in-game content!
It merely exists as a way to support my work and hopefully help me create more cool games!

If you liked Will The Man Get Frog and consider buying this DLC, then thank you very much!
As a reward, you'll get the OST of the game in high-quality format!
You will ALSO get my gratitude and the satisfaction of knowing that somewhere someone is making games thanks to your help.

Anyway, thank you. Whether you can support me or not, I'm really grateful for your interest in my game. I hope you enjoy it, and the next ones too!

short_description: Did you like Will The Man Get Frog? Do you have a few bucks and want to support the dev? If so, feel free to buy this DLC! It only contains the game's OST, but you will have my gratitude and the satisfaction of knowing that somewhere someone is making games thanks to your help.
